import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import "./Header.modulus.css" import Authentication from "../../Routes/auth/Authentication/Authentication" const Header = ({ userSignOut, authUser }) => { const header = useRef() window.onscroll = () => { if (window.scrollY > 0) { header.current.classList.add('active') } else { header.current.classList.remove('active') } } console.log(Authentication.prototype) return (
